Advisory.Description: Square Open Source Retrofit versions prior to commit 4a693c5aeeef2be6c7ecf80e7b5ec79f6ab59437 contain a XML External Entity (XXE) vulnerability in JAXB. An attacker could use this to remotely read files from the file system or to perform SSRF. This vulnerability appears to have been fixed in commit 4a693c5aeeef2be6c7ecf80e7b5ec79f6ab59437.
Advisory.Summary: Moderate severity vulnerability that affects com.squareup.retrofit2:retrofit
